text:
Hey Lehi, please meet Sidd your incredible E-Mentor I've been telling you about :smile:.  Feel free to introduce yourselves, say a little bit about what you would like to get out of the mentorship and continue chatting within this channel. :wave:

I will now be leaving the channel, but please direct message myself or emma-prospela if you have any questions. All the best for now! :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi Lehi!

Just gonna give you a quick introduction! My name is Sidd and I work as a 3D animator at Carse and Waterman! While I primarily do character animation in 3D I started out as a 2D animator and illustrator, so I have a bit of experience in both fields :relaxed:
If you have any questions at all please feel free to ask me anything!

Hey Sidd! :smiley: sorry the weekends been super hectic leading up to pride, catching up with everything now. So I know you've had a little background on me from my application right? I'm very interested in continuing with 3D character animation and I also do creature related stuff. So I'm looking to improve as much as I can there. I'm interested in both kids TV and VFX so I'm building reels for both. I'm generally confident in my acting choices but I've generally got a way to go

Thank you by the way for agreeing to be my mentor I really appreciate it, and I'd love to hear more about what you do at your studio :grin: also curious about balancing 2D and 3D interests or 3D with any other really. So, another interest of mine is voice over work, I do acting classes now and improv etc which is great for killing two birds with one stone! Haha
